questions.quote: Oh, look at this. There's no place to park around here. I don't even know why they sell cars in Manhattan.
But it--eh.. It was here, I'm tellin' you, an' w--w--it was really here! The, there was, a, bar, and a, an' a dance floor..
Yes, Jerry. I just checked your duck...it is more succulent than even I had hoped.
Well, the drive home should be a delight. I'm speeding the whole way. Let them throw me in jail. I don't care.  That's the manager? Do you want me to see if we can get another room?
Well.. For one thing the glue isn't very adhesive. It takes a lot of moisture to make them stick.
Well, I'm going to the game tonight, and me and these five other guys are gonna take our shirts off and spell out 'Devils'.
Well, you on all fours, that thing vibratin', kickin' up sawdust, ho ho! She'll get the picture!
It was nice meeting you By the way, How do you warm up your fingers before you play?
Hey, stay away from the chicken. Bad, bad chicken, mess you up.
Because, if I hear one more rattle - just one - your out on your can. And if you are undead - I'll find out about that too.
